hit_icon: Select a colored icon with results.
no_matches: No search results, in this category.
dialog_search_favo_food:
Search your favorite food:

  🍔 Burger     🍰 Dessert

  🥗 Salad      🐮 Vegan

  🇮🇹 Italian      🍕 Pizza
toast_instructions_marker: MARKER: Tap any marker to see more information of that selected place.
toast_instructions_location: LOCATION: Tap the location button (top right) to zoom to your current location.
toast_instructions_close: CLOSE: Tap the close button (bottom) to see the complete list of all places worldwide.
toast_instructions_details: DETAILS: Tap the info box to load the details of that place.
toast_instructions_route: ROUTE: Tap the route button (bottom right), to navigate to the selected place.
toast_instructions_map: MAP: Tap the map at any free space, to close the info box of a selected place.
